static char __pyx_doc_6vision_11convolution_4hog[] = "\n    Efficiently convolves a filter around an image for HOG.\n\n    Only computes features in the valid region of the image and returns a score\n    matrix. The filtersize should be the size of the templated to score with,\n    and must match with hogfilter.\n\n    - image should be an Python Image Library image.\n    - filtersize should be a 2-tuple of (width,height) sizes for the template\n      filter.\n    - hogfilter should be a (width/hogbin-2, height/hogbin-2, 13) numpy array\n      of the learned HOG weights.\n    ";

 041:     """
 042:     Efficiently convolves a filter around an image for HOG.
 043: 
 044:     Only computes features in the valid region of the image and returns a score
 045:     matrix. The filtersize should be the size of the templated to score with,
 046:     and must match with hogfilter.
 047: 
 048:     - image should be an Python Image Library image.
 049:     - filtersize should be a 2-tuple of (width,height) sizes for the template
 050:       filter.
 051:     - hogfilter should be a (width/hogbin-2, height/hogbin-2, 13) numpy array
 052:       of the learned HOG weights.
